acme.util.option

Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.util.option.CommandLine

  • public class CommandLine
extends Object
    Abstraction for processing command line arguments.

    • Field Summary

      static Option<String> javaArgs
      Set to all the args after the last option provided.

        Create a new command line option
        Parameters:
        id - keyword for the flag. Set with -id=X
        dV - initial value
        k - indicates whether the option is stable or not
        usage - describes the option

        public static CommandLineOption<String> makeAppendableString(String id,
                                             String dV,
                                             String sep,
                                             CommandLineOption.Kind k,
                                             String usage)
        Create a new command line option. Concats together all string args, separating them with sep.
        Parameters:
        id - keyword for the flag. Set with -id=X
        dV - initial value
        sep - separator character for concatenated string
        k - indicates whether the option is stable or not
        usage - describes the option

      • makeEnumChoice

        public static <T extends Enum<T>> CommandLineOption<T> makeEnumChoice(String id,
                                                      T initial,
                                                      CommandLineOption.Kind k,
                                                      String usage,
                                                      Class<T> choices)
        Create a new command line option to choose from an enumerated type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the enumeration.
        Parameters:
        id - the key for the flag
        initial - initial value
        k - indicates whether the option is stable or not
        usage - describes the option
        choices - The meta object for the enum type

        Parameters:
        id - the key for the flag
        initial - initial value
        k - indicates whether the option is stable or not
        usage - describes the option
        choices - The string to choose among
